snippet: Police who found four people dead at a Southern California home said on Friday they believe the crime was a murder-suicide carried out by a man who fatally shot his girlfriend, her mother and teenage brother before turning the gun on himself....

headline.print_headline: California Man Kills Three, Takes Own Life in Apparent Murder-Suicide: Police
headline.main: California Man Kills Three, Takes Own Life in Apparent Murder-Suicide: Police

lead_paragraph: Police who found four people dead at a Southern California home said on Friday they believe the crime was a murder-suicide carried out by a man who fatally shot his girlfriend, her mother and teenage brother before turning the gun on himself.
